EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-01-18-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Jacksonville.ES-2018-02-08.EMAIL - Resche
EmailTemplate.subject: See you at TPC Sawgrass?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're looking forward to hosting an exclusive event with our friends at Cisco in Jacksonville for a luncheon at the club house followed by an afternoon on the greens at TPC Sawgrass.
Will we see you there? To register just click on the link below!
When: Wednesday, February 21st, 2018 - 11:00 AM Where: TPC Sawgrass 110 Championship Way Ponte Vedra Beach, FL 32082
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>
- Your Friends at Turbonomic
